name: List of Best Notion Widgets
description: Includes the most aesthetically appealing widgets for notion pages.Most of the widgets are free.The list includes embeds, links of the particular widget.There are more than 25 widgets on the list and will try to update new widgets very soon.note: No widget is made by me, they are just my curations.please mail me at adithyamulukuri@gmail.com for removal or credits.
